title: Ideas from kernels and discussion (LB ~ 1.2)
description: IntroThis is my first kaggle competition and I have really enjoyed it so far. The following kernel has been inspired by:  https://www.kaggle.com/ogrellier/plasticc-in-a-kernel-meta-and-data https://www.kaggle.com/c/PLAsTiCC-2018/discussion/70908 https://www.kaggle.com/meaninglesslives/simple-neural-net-for-time-series-classification  Still haven't figured out the feature hidden in here https://www.kaggle.com/c/PLAsTiCC-2018/discussion/70725#416740 A big thanks to the kaggle community that makes this competition so enjoyable.
